name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast
display_help: Fire Blast allows you to blast fire at foes, with a tendency to set them ablaze for added damage over time.

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Flares
powers.display_help: A quick attack that throws Flares at the target. Little damage, but very fast. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 15.85 fire damage on target after 0.5s delay
-20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 15s on target

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Fire_Blast
powers.display_help: Sends a Blast of Fire at a targeted foe and sets the target on fire for a short period of time. Slower recharge rate than Flares, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 4 ticks of 80.00% chance for 7.92 fire damage over 3.1s on target after 0.5s delay
-20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 15s on target

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Fire_Ball
powers.display_help: Hurls an exploding Fireball that consumes a targeted foe, and all nearby enemies. Anyone in that explosion is burned and set ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 3 ticks of 80.00% chance for 7.92 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Blaze
powers.display_help: A devastating flame attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 5 ticks of 80.00% chance for 11.89 fire damage over 4.1s on target after 0.5s delay

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage and range. Recharge: Long

display_info: 33.30% strength to range for 10s on self
50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Fire_Breath
powers.display_help: You can breathe forth a torrent of fire that burns all foes within its narrow cone. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 30° arc (6 targets max)

display_info: 3 ticks of 30.91 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay
3 ticks of 30.85 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 1s delay

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Blazing_Blast
powers.display_help: An extremely quick long range beam of fire that blasts your foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 13 ticks of 5.16 fire damage over 2.5s on target
3.3 magnitude knock on target after 0.6s delay
13 ticks of 4.00 fire damage over 2.5s on target

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Rain_of_Fire
powers.display_help: Summons a Rain of Fire over a targeted location, burning foes and reducing their movement speed within a large area. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Sentinel_Ranged.Fire_Blast.Inferno
powers.display_help: Unleashes a massive fiery explosion to devastate all nearby enemies and set them ablaze. Inferno deals Extreme Fire damage to all nearby foes and inflicts Moderate Fire damage over time. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
powers.display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Fire/Smash), Foe Moderate DoT(Fire)

display_info: 3 ticks of 80.00% chance for 7.92 fire damage over 2.1s on target after 0.5s delay
